---
title: "Phosphoproteo data humanization"
output: html_document
---
In this script, NetworKIN predictions are run.

__NetworKIN requires Python 3 and the BLAST software.___

```{r}
dir.create("tmp", showWarnings = FALSE) #create a temporary folder for NetworKIN
Sys.setenv(TMPDIR = "tmp")
blastall_location <- "~/blast-2.2.17/bin/blastall" #locate BLAST software
system(paste0("networkin/bin/NetworKIN3.0_release/NetworKIN.py -n   networkin/bin/NetPhorest_human_2.1/netphorest -b ", blastall_location, " 9606 networkin/databases/uniprot122013/cleaned_9606_uniprot_201312.fa data/outputs/networKIN_input.res > data/outputs/networKIN_output.tsv")) #Run networKIN
```
